sourcesContent:
<template>
    <el-upload
        class="files-upload"
        :action="url"
        :accept="filesFormat"
        :multiple="isMultiple"
        :show-file-list="isShowList"
        :on-success="uploadSuccess"
        :on-error="uploadError"
    >
        <slot/>
    </el-upload>
</template>

<script>
export default {
    name: 'Upload',
    props: {
        url: {
            type: String,
            default: ''
        },
        filesFormat: {
            type: String,
            default: ''
        },
        isMultiple: {
            type: Boolean,
            default: false
        },
        isShowList: {
            type: Boolean,
            default: false
        }
    },
    methods: {
        uploadSuccess(res, file) {
            if ([200, 0].includes(res.code)) {
                const data = res.data
                this.$emit('on-success', data)
            } else {
                this.$emit('on-error')
                this.$message.error(res.msg)
            }
        },
        uploadError(res, file) {
            console.log(res)
            this.$emit('on-error')
        }
    }
}
</script>

<style lang="less">
.files-upload {
    display: inline-block;
    vertical-align: top;
}
</style>
